name: Killarney Lakeland Cottages

reviews.text: We stayed for a couple of nights in house number 1 with a 16mth old and a 3 year old. It had absolutely everything we needed. We wanted for nothing. the grass outside was fantastic for kids. I even put on a load of washing and hung it out on clothes line that was well concealed behind house. Perfect location for a family. 2min drive to muckross. 5 min drive to killarney town and that includes traffic. Would highly recommend and we will defo stay again.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a Torc style cottage for two but when we got there we were given a cottage with three big bedrooms! The cottage had a beautiful view of the mountains and it was only a 5 minute walk down into the national park. Cottage is lovely has everything you need! Just a short drive from town. Owner is very friendly also! Excellent value for money
reviews.title: Lovely stay :)

reviews.text: Overall very nice stay. Would come again and would reccomend :)
reviews.title: you feel like at home!!

reviews.text: We stay in Lakeland Cottages one week,the place is fantastic,into Killarney National Park,there is a lot of shop,bars,restaurant only three minutes by car. The owner,John,is lovely and friendly man,if you have any problem he have a solution for you. The cottage is fantastic,fully equipment,the wifi is available and free. I hope to stay here again in the future. Cheers!!!
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: I booked the Torc Style Cottage, which sleeps 4-5 people (I was traveling with 2 others, we each had our own room).
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

description: Charming complex of holiday cottages, near the Killarney National Park. Open all year. Ideal for families, Couples and Groups. Special rates for Couples. Weekly and short stay rentals. Start any day of the week.Ideal base for touring in South West Ireland, using day trips to Ring of Kerry, Dingle, Cliffs of Moher, and Blarney and West Cork. Free WIFI.
